channel.title: AI on Fletcher's Cloud Journey
channel.description: Recent content in AI on Fletcher's Cloud Journey

item.title: Starting Wth Rest Calls With AzCli With Some Copilot Help
item.description: What are we doing? I am working more and more with the Azure REST APIs now. My previous post using API with Powershell got me thinking about opening the idea to go beyond PowerShell. I am very open with people around my lack of skill with Azure CLI, I do however want to learn some new things. We also have this great technology called GitHub Copilot and ChatGPT, so I figured let me dig into “AI” as I am a techy at heart and let me improve my skills with Azure CLI.
